title: Obsession: Warm Bodies, Cold Hearts
description: "Warm Bodies, Cold Hearts" is the story of a beautiful young woman, and a handsome twenty-something actor who falls devastatingly in love with her. Sydney arrogantly discards her hot young lover, but after realizing her mistakes, tries to mend the crack in his heart; but betrayal covers Danny and Sydney like a recurring afternoon shadow, and they fight to find an avenue back to each other. The suicide of a friend, the murder of an enemy and the betrayal of lovers cast a pall over their lives, but the light in their hearts never diminish.
author: Rachel E. Rice
